about: As a software developer at a product-based startup, I specialize in building scalable web applications with Next.js, React.js, TypeScript, and Python. I integrate APIs using FastAPI, optimize performance with TanStack/React Query, and manage data with MongoDB. I enhance product features based on Figma designs, ensuring seamless user experiences. Experienced in Agile development, I collaborate cross-functionally to meet sprint goals while maintaining high-quality code through disciplined Git workflows.
